meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a fad.
meanings.sent1: The new toy's popularity was fadlike, spreading quickly among the children.
meanings.sent2: Her fadlike obsession with the latest fashion trends changed every week.
meanings.sent3: The fadlike craze for pet rocks in the 70s still makes me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The viral video's fadlike success took the internet by storm.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's fadlike menu items kept customers coming back for more.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a fad.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity's fadlike behavior attracted media attention.
meanings.sent2: The fadlike diet trend promised quick results but lacked sustainability.
meanings.sent3: His fadlike habit of collecting unusual socks always made him stand out.
meanings.sent4: The politician's fadlike promises soon faded away.
meanings.sent5: The fadlike nature of social media trends is constantly evolving.
